definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes

sentences.english: It is also alleged that Room 39 is involved in drug smuggling and illicit weapon sales.
sentences.chinese: 也有人斷言39號房涉及毒品走私和違法的軍火交易。

sentences.english: "Mbeki was chairperson of the subcommittee that made all the decisions on the arms deal, " says Feinstein.
sentences.chinese: 姆貝基是進行軍火交易決策的委員會主席。
